data.name: War Thunder - Ground Forces High-res Texture Pack
data.detailed_description:
Note!

To activate this DLC for your Gaijin account, it has to be linked to Steam account that made the purchase. If you aren't sure it is, please follow the instruction. If you still have any questions, contact our support (login on the same website and use the "Submit a request" button at the top).


About the Game

Attention! In order to use this texture pack, you need a video card with at least 3GB of video memory!

This high-resolution texture pack will improve your War Thunder gaming experience without degrading FPS!
data.about_the_game:
Attention! In order to use this texture pack, you need a video card with at least 3GB of video memory!

This high-resolution texture pack will improve your War Thunder gaming experience without degrading FPS!
data.short_description: This high-resolution texture pack will improve your War Thunder gaming experience without degrading FPS!
data.supported_languages:
English*, German*, French*, Italian*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese, Russian*, Japanese*, Polish*, Czech*, Turkish*, Portuguese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Hungarian, Ukrainian, Traditional Chinese, Romanian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4GB (Windows Vista/7/8/10)
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5100 / AMD Radeon 77XX / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660. The minimum supported resolution for the game is 720p
  • Hard Drive: 17 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or Ryzen 5 3600 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1060 and higher, Radeon RX 560 and higher
  • Hard Drive: 35 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Catalina v.10.15 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (Xeon processors not supported)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro 5200 (Mac), or analog from AMD/Nvidia for Mac. Minimum supported resolution for the game is 720p with Metal support
  • Hard Drive: 17 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS Big Sur v. 10.16 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 (Xeon processors not supported)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon Vega II or higher with Metal support.
  • Hard Drive: 35 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Most modern 64bit Linux distributions, SteamOS
  • Processor: Dual-Core 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 660 with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months) / similar AMD with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months; the minimum supported resolution for the game is 720p) with Vulkan support.
  • Hard Drive: 17 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA 1060 with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months) / similar AMD (Radeon RX 560) with latest proprietary drivers (not older than 6 months) with Vulkan support.
  • Hard Drive: 35 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
